bio.title: About Me
bio.text:
I'm a software engineering student located in Montreal, Quebec. I have a great passion and experience for Web development, from Front-End to Back-End. My favorite programming language has always been JavaScript (more specifically, TypeScript) and I always get excited to try out new technologies to build something amazing! I love to learn new things and I'm always looking for ways to improve myself, such as self learning by trying them out, taking an online course or participating in a CTF.

I am also a big Star Wars fan. Whenever a new series or season comes out, I'll be first to watch it! I love EDM music and my favorite artist is Illenium. I like putting some good jam on to fuel my coding fingers! I am also a huge dog lover and am the proud owner of an adorable Soft Coated Wheaten Terrier named "Kingsley"!

skills.title: Skills
skills.text: Here's a list of my technical skills. I specialize in Web technologies, but I've learned a thing or two about other fields while I was in school and in past job experiences.

proficiency.1: Beginner - Tipped my toe in the water.
proficiency.2: Intermediate - I've learned a thing or two.
proficiency.3: Advanced - I can handle projects with this!
proficiency.5: Master - I eat this every day!

projects.title: Projects
projects.text: Here's a few of the projects I've worked on. You can see the full list on my <0>{{github}}</0> profile, but these are the ones I am most proud of. Even if some of these were eventually left unfinished (like most my repos, oops!), I still learned a lot from them.

short.nuclui: A React UI framework, built with TypeScript, to make your developement easier so you can give more focus on your app and less on the design!
short.genft: Generate NFT collections by composing multiple layers together.
short.punchbot: Minimalist Discord bot to keep track of time worked on projects.
short.codelock: Minecraft plugin to lock entities with an "enter and forget" code lock. Inspired by Rust's code lock.
short.tinderbullseye: Find the people who liked you on Tinder, without Gold. (Patched by Tinder)
short.react: Have an audio visualizer as your desktop wallpaper. Includes 100+ customizable options.
short.cuisto: Restaurant system to manage inventory, suppliers and orders.

experience.title: Experience
experience.text: Here's an overview of my past experiences as a developer. Before starting to work in this field, while I was just starting as a student, I worked two and a half years as a cashier at Canada's renowned coffee shop, Tim Horton's.

desjardins.description: The Desjardins Group is a Canadian financial services cooperative and the largest federation of credit unions in North America.

ipnos.description: Ipnos is a leading wellness app development studio. They're the creator of the sleep & relaxation app BetterSleep (formerly Relax Melodies).
points: Create a rich user interface in a Web app environment using Angular.
Create Back-End services using cloud functions that are used by the Web app.
Research and analyze the feasability of new development projects.

comact.name: Comact
comact.description: Comact designs and manufactures sawmill and planer mill equipment. They offer the most comprehensive range of products on the market.
points: Create helpful tools to generate data and send it to an artificial intelligence system.
Upgrade technologies to the latest version and implement their new features.
Evaluate the impact of needs across available systems.
Maintain and improve the current web applications using React.
Create new web applications using React.
